titles.title: Small Business Acquisition Transparency Act of 2019
To revise postaward explanations for unsuccessful offerors for certain contracts in the Federal Acquisition Regulation, and for other purposes.
Small Business Acquisition Transparency Act of 2019

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.

bill.summary:
Small Business Acquisition Transparency Act of 2019
This bill requires a federal contracting officer, upon written request from an unsuccessful offeror for a task order or delivery order, to provide a brief explanation as to why such offeror was unsuccessful.
Specifically, this applies to an offer in an amount greater than the simplified acquisition threshold and less than or equal to $5.5 million issued under an indefinite delivery-indefinite quantity contract.
